name: The Broken Seal
description: In this game designed exclusively for VR, you can use your own voice to cast devastating spells and destroy your enemies. Join our open-world RPG and experience more than 40 hours of content. Find loot, face bosses and create a new legend - you!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX 8300 @ 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Strongly recommend wearing the headset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 6700k @ 4GHz or AMD FX 9590 @ 4.7GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD R9 FURY X DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Strongly recommend wearing the headset
